entities.name: Harry Potter
entities.description: The protagonist, a wizard who survived Lord Voldemort's killing curse as an infant. He possesses the ability to speak Parseltongue and is a talented Seeker.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 2 - Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub
Harry Potter 3 - Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub
harry_potter_section_02.txt

entities.name: Ronald Weasley
entities.description: Harry Potter's best friend, a member of the Weasley family. He owns a rat named Scabbers which turns out to be Peter Pettigrew.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 2 - Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub
Harry Potter 3 - Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub
harry_potter_section_02.txt

entities.name: Hermione Granger
entities.description: Harry's intelligent and studious best friend. She uses a Time-Turner to attend multiple classes and helps Harry save Sirius Black.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 2 - Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub
Harry Potter 3 - Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub
harry_potter_section_02.txt

entities.name: Lord Voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist, heir of Slytherin. He preserved his sixteen-year-old self in a diary to open the Chamber of Secrets.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 2 - Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub
harry_potter_section_02.txt

entities.name: Ginevra Weasley
entities.description: Ron's younger sister who is possessed by Tom Riddle's diary and forced to open the Chamber of Secrets.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 2 - Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub
harry_potter_section_02.txt

entities.name: Albus Dumbledore
entities.description: The Headmaster of Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 2 - Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub
harry_potter_section_02.txt

entities.name: Severus Snape
entities.description: The Potions Master at Hogwarts and Head of Slytherin House. He holds a grudge against Harry because of James Potter.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 3 - Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub
harry_potter_section_02.txt

entities.name: Rubeus Hagrid
entities.description: The gamekeeper and later Care of Magical Creatures teacher at Hogwarts. He was framed for opening the Chamber of Secrets.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 2 - Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub
harry_potter_section_02.txt

entities.name: Sirius Black
entities.description: Harry's godfather and an unregistered Animagus. He escapes Azkaban to find Peter Pettigrew and protect Harry.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 3 - Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub
harry_potter_section_02.txt

entities.name: Remus Lupin
entities.description: The Defense Against the Dark Arts teacher in Harry's third year. He is a werewolf and a creator of the Marauder's Map.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 3 - Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub
harry_potter_section_02.txt

entities.name: Peter Pettigrew
entities.description: A former friend of James Potter who betrayed the Potters to Voldemort. He has been living as Ron Weasley's pet rat, Scabbers.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 3 - Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub
harry_potter_section_02.txt

entities.name: Dobby
entities.description: A house-elf formerly serving the Malfoy family who tries to warn Harry about the Chamber of Secrets. Harry tricks Lucius Malfoy into freeing him.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 2 - Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub
harry_potter_section_02.txt

entities.name: Gilderoy Lockhart

attributes.role: Defense Against the Dark Arts Teacher

entities.description: A celebrity wizard who becomes the Defense Against the Dark Arts teacher. He is a fraud who steals other wizards' achievements using Memory Charms.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 2 - Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub
harry_potter_section_02.txt

entities.name: Draco Malfoy
entities.description: Harry's rival at Hogwarts. He is prejudiced against Muggle-borns and his father, Lucius Malfoy, was a Death Eater.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 2 - Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub
harry_potter_section_02.txt

entities.name: Lucius Malfoy
entities.description: Draco Malfoy's father. He slipped Tom Riddle's diary into Ginny Weasley's cauldron.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 2 - Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub
harry_potter_section_02.txt

entities.name: The Chamber of Secrets
entities.description: A legendary secret chamber within Hogwarts created by Salazar Slytherin, housing a Basilisk.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 2 - Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub
harry_potter_section_02.txt

entities.name: Azkaban
entities.description: The wizard prison guarded by dementors.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 2 - Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub
harry_potter_section_02.txt

entities.name: The Shrieking Shack
entities.description: An abandoned house in Hogsmeade, rumored to be haunted, but actually used by Remus Lupin for his werewolf transformations.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 3 - Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub
harry_potter_section_02.txt

entities.name: The Marauder's Map
entities.description: A magical map of Hogwarts that shows the location of everyone in the castle.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 3 - Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub
harry_potter_section_02.txt

entities.name: Firebolt
entities.description: A world-class racing broom sent to Harry Potter by Sirius Black.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 3 - Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub
harry_potter_section_02.txt

entities.name: Tom Riddle's Diary
entities.description: A diary that preserved the memory of the sixteen-year-old Tom Riddle and possessed Ginny Weasley.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 2 - Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub
harry_potter_section_02.txt

entities.name: Basilisk

attributes.abilities: Kill with a stare, venomous fangs

entities.description: A giant serpent controlled by the Heir of Slytherin that resides in the Chamber of Secrets.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 2 - Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub
harry_potter_section_02.txt

entities.name: Dementor
entities.description: Dark creatures that guard Azkaban prison. They feed on human happiness.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 3 - Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub
harry_potter_section_02.txt

entities.name: Buckbeak
entities.description: A hippogriff kept by Hagrid. He is sentenced to death for attacking Draco Malfoy but is saved by Harry and Hermione.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 3 - Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub
harry_potter_section_02.txt

entities.name: Aragog
entities.description: A giant spider raised by Hagrid, living in the Forbidden Forest.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 2 - Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub
harry_potter_section_02.txt

entities.name: Time-Turner
entities.description: A magical device used by Hermione to attend multiple classes at once, and later to save Sirius Black and Buckbeak.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 3 - Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub
harry_potter_section_02.txt

relationships.description: Harry and Ron are best friends.
relationships.evidence: Harry missed his best friends, Ron Weasley and Hermione Granger.

relationships.description: Harry and Hermione are best friends.
relationships.evidence: Harry missed his best friends, Ron Weasley and Hermione Granger.

relationships.description: Ginny was possessed by Tom Riddle through his diary.
relationships.evidence: Ginny Weasley opened the Chamber of Secrets. ... I grew stronger and stronger on a diet of her deepest fears, her darkest secrets.

relationships.description: Sirius Black is Harry Potter's godfather.
relationships.evidence: I’m also — I don’t know if anyone ever told you — I’m your godfather.

relationships.description: Peter Pettigrew lived as Ron's rat, Scabbers.
relationships.evidence: Scabbers the rat was secondhand... He had once belonged to Ron’s brother Percy.

relationships.description: Lupin and Sirius were friends at school and reconciled in the Shrieking Shack.
relationships.evidence: For the first time ever, I had friends, three great friends. Sirius Black … Peter Pettigrew … and, of course, your father, Harry — James Potter.

relationships.description: Harry Potter freed Dobby by tricking Lucius Malfoy into giving him a sock.
relationships.evidence: Harry Potter freed Dobby! ... Harry Potter set Dobby free!

relationships.description: Harry receives a Firebolt from Sirius Black.
relationships.evidence: It was I who sent you the Firebolt.

relationships.description: Fred and George gave the map to Harry.
relationships.evidence: We bequeath it to you. We don’t really need it anymore.

relationships.description: Harry killed the Basilisk with the Sword of Gryffindor.
relationships.evidence: Harry threw his whole weight behind the sword and drove it to the hilt into the roof of the serpent’s mouth.

relationships.description: Harry destroyed the diary with a basilisk fang.
relationships.evidence: Harry seized the basilisk fang on the floor next to him and plunged it straight into the heart of the book.

schema_proposals.name: pet_of
schema_proposals.description: Indicates that an animal (or Animagus) is the pet of a character.

schema_proposals.name: freed_by
schema_proposals.description: Indicates that a house-elf or enslaved entity was freed by a character.

schema_proposals.name: destroyed
schema_proposals.description: Indicates that a character destroyed an artifact (especially significant ones like Horcruxes).

schema_proposals.name: friend_of
schema_proposals.description: Indicates a friendship between two characters.

schema_proposals.name: possessed_by
schema_proposals.description: Indicates a character being controlled or possessed by another entity or artifact.
